attributes.action: Reduce the tax on LPG and other clean fuels to encourage the wider use of this green fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment rant on about reducing emmissions from vehicles, but in the last budget increased the tax on LPG the very fuel that we  should be encouraged to use. This petition is to try to get the goverment to lead by example and not now tax the green fuel motorist.
